sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you try to <radical>go</radical> somewhere but you're too <radical>heavy</radical> you'll <kanji>collide</kanji> with everything. Cars, people, houses. You're too heavy to dodge them, so you collide with it all.
meaningInfo: Imagine being too heavy to go anywhere without colliding with things.
readingMnemonic: You're going around the town, you <kanji>collide</kanji> with a bunch of things, when all of a sudden you collide with the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>)! Oh no! The shogun looks really mad.
readingInfo: The Shougun is glaring at you from the ground. "You've been colliding with my entire city and now you collide into ME?!" Smoke blows out his nostrils.
